name: Macross 7: Ginga no Heart o Furuwasero!!
overview: Macross 7 -Ginga No Heart Wo Furuwasero!! is an Action Shooting + Rhythm Game for the Game Boy Color developed by Gamates with I-System Tokyo and published by Epoch. The game was released in Japan in the year 2000. The Macross 7 fleet has run into what appears to be an inhabitable planet. Reconnaisance units were sent to investigate, but none of them returned. Meanwhile, Basara of Fire Bomber decides to launch, seeking a new audience for his passionate songs. Suspecting that the planet is not what it seems, Mylene, Ray, Veffidas, Gamurin, Captain Max & Mayor Millia decide to follow him.
